EndpointGroup.description: The EndpointGroup schema describes group of endpoints that are managed as a unit.
EndpointGroup.longDescription: This resource shall represent a group of endpoints that are managed as a unit for a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

AccessState.description: The access state for this group.
AccessState.longDescription: The value of this property shall contain the access state for all associated resources in this endpoint group.

Endpoints.description: The endpoints in this endpoint group.
Endpoints.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of links to resources of type Endpoint that represent the endpoints that are in this endpoint group.

GroupType.longDescription: The value of this property shall contain the endpoint group type.  If this endpoint group represents a SCSI target group, the value of this property shall contain `Server` or `Target`.

Identifier.description: The durable name for the endpoint group.
Identifier.longDescription: This property shall contain the durable name for the endpoint group.

Links.description: The links to other resources that are related to this resource.
Links.longDescription: This property shall contain links to resources that are related to but are not contained by, or subordinate to, this resource.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

Preferred.description: An indication if access to the resources through the endpoint group is preferred.
Preferred.longDescription: The value of this property shall indicate if access to the resources through the endpoint group is preferred over access through other endpoints.  The default value for this property is `false`.

TargetEndpointGroupIdentifier.description: The SCSI-defined identifier for this group.
TargetEndpointGroupIdentifier.longDescription: The value of this property shall contain a SCSI-defined identifier for this group that corresponds to the TARGET PORT GROUP field in the REPORT TARGET PORT GROUPS response and the TARGET PORT GROUP field in an INQUIRY VPD page 85 response, type 5h identifier.  See the INCITS SAM-5 specification.  This property might not be present if the endpoint group does not represent a SCSI target group.

enumDescriptions.Client: The group contains the client (initiator) endpoints.
enumDescriptions.Server: The group contains the server (target) endpoints.

enumLongDescriptions.Client: This value shall indicate that the endpoint group contains client (initiator) endpoints.  If the associated endpoints contain the EntityRole property, the EntityRole property shall contain the value `Initiator` or `Both`.
enumLongDescriptions.Server: This value shall indicate that the endpoint group contains server (target) endpoints.  If the associated endpoints contain the EntityRole property, the EntityRole property shall contain the value `Target` or `Both`.

Links.description: The links to other resources that are related to this resource.
Links.longDescription: This Redfish Specification-described type shall contain links to resources that are related to but are not contained by, or subordinate to, this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties contained in this object shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

title: #EndpointGroup.v1_0_3.EndpointGroup
